meta.title: Breaker — Trail Tech Intro  and Half (Director's Cut)

distinctives: metal tech gauntlet on right forearm
gear: field notebook tucked at back pocket

constraints: Do not render or burn-in subtitles, captions, lyrics, or any on-screen text.
No additional characters appear in frame.
Feet must be human-like, plantigrade (five toes, natural arch); no ape-like/digitigrade feet.
description: On a fern-lined logging trail at blue-hour, Breaker jogs in, quick-scans with his gauntlet, and introduces himself with a grin.

setting.location: Abandoned logging road, soft dirt with ferns
setting.environment_details: Moist air haze; distant creek; occasional fireflies; wet leaf sheen

subjects.description: 6'6" athletic Bigfoot; chestnut fur; red cap backward; rectangular glasses; headphones at neck; metal tech gauntlet (right)
subjects.action: jogs into frame, raises gauntlet for a quick scan, glances to lens with a grin, speaks, then playful tap to cap brim

camera.motion: gentle handheld follow from ~2 m back; settle to quasi-static on delivery
camera.framing: trail leading lines; ferns FG parallax; fireflies intermittent

effects: cool blue-hour top light with soft fill
gauntlet HUD glow reflected in glasses; two fireflies cross foreground

shots.action: Breaker jogs in; tiny splash through shallow puddle; headphones bounce
raises gauntlet; quick scan sweep; LEDs tick
Breaker locks eyes to lens, parks stance, delivers line with bright grin
drops gauntlet; playful two-finger tap to cap brim backward; short chuckle

audio.ambient: distant creek; damp forest hush; a few night insects starting
audio.foley: soft jog footfalls; puddle splash; gauntlet servo whirr and LED clicks; cap brim tap
audio.mix_notes: keep speech forward and clean; ambience ~-14 LUFS relative; minimal reverb

speech.content: ɑːɫˈɹaɪt ɡaɪz … aːv bɪn ˈtæːskt wɪθ ɪkˈspleːnɪŋ sʌm θɪŋz.

performance.lip_sync_hint: easy smile on 'guys'; clear alveolar on 'tasked'; brief jaw relax after ellipsis.

render_hints.compression: preserve fog gradient and fur edges
